Bindings.Binding: if not ( DTM_SetEmergencyStop ) then return; end DTM_SetEmergencyStop("TOGGLE");
if not ( DTM_EntityData_Reset ) then return; end DTM_EntityData_Reset();
if not ( DTM_ToggleThreatList ) then return; end DTM_ToggleThreatList("target");
if not ( DTM_ToggleThreatList ) then return; end DTM_ToggleThreatList("focus");
if not ( DTM_TogglePresenceList ) then return; end DTM_TogglePresenceList("player");
if not ( DTM_ToggleRegainList ) then return; end DTM_ToggleRegainList("player");
